name: Android Alpha
description:
This game is just a small demo, where you are a recon droid sent in to fight an enemy camp. The game is only one big level with 3 areas to it, you can play the game however you wish, but i will warn you it is difficult. You are equipped with a small SMG and it's recoil is very strong. You have the ability to triple jump since you are a droid as well so have fun with that.

Ammo is all over the map so make sure to take care of that ammo, your health recharges over time, but you have no health bar.

There is no plans for future updates.

Game file size: 9GB. Windows 64 only. 8gb ram recommended, with a solid graphics card. Graphics settings option in main menu.
